tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We came here with the pain in few teeth two months back. Pain was severe and had some swelling also. So we came to this clinic for opinion and treatment for same. Doctor was friendly and explained me about root canal treatment and about the whole procedure. We underwent 2 root canal treatment along with the caps for same at affordable rate. We are very happy with the treatment. Thanku to all the staff of adithri dental .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hello everyone..my daughter had swelling of right side of face since few years.we visited many hospitals for the same and she undergone some surgery for same but it was recurrent and never went off completely. So we came to adithri dental clinic for checkup and consultation for same. Dr harandh Reddy did surgery for the swelling of the cheek bone. He explained the whole procedure to us and was very kind to us. At affordable price he did the surgery under anaesthesia and now even after couple of days n weeks she never complained of any discomfort. We are happy with the treatment sir has given to her. ** ** ********** **** ******* ** *** ***** Thank you sir for making it happen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,
review: Its really a pleasure to share my experience in adithri dental clinic..very much impressed with the work of dr. Haranadh Reddy as he has done implant placement for my along with the prosthesis. I came with missing teeth and now happily going back with fixed permanent teeth. Im satisfied with their services...my teeth looks natural and I'm comfortable in eating and talking with that. I got caps in just three days so never suffered for esthetic or functional purposes.it was overall a good experience and a painless treatment. Thankyou so much doctor.

It was done by dr.. never had any complications in these years..now came with decayed tooth with pain and swelling in upper last teeth. So dr. Subhanki did root canal treatment for that teeth. Now no more pain is there.. I'm feeling happy and relaxed as my treatment are done effectively with affordable charges and no more complications are there. Thank you so much to all the doctors of this clinic. Had a great experience in this clinic.

Dr. Haranadh reddy and dr. Lavanya mam are very enthusiastic and passionate dentists who are working hard for the well fare of people by relieving them from their dental pains and we are thankful to thedoctots of adithri dental for this great work and caring for the patients.highly recommend clinic to everyone. Highly impressed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My son had jaw tumor, almost a year back .we visited lot of hospitals and clinics for the treatment  but we never found a good doctor to deal with my son's  problem, finally we visited adithri dental clinic and adithri maxillofacial center dr.haranadh Reddy and Dr Lavanya  diagnosed my son's problem and patiently listened with my  concerns regarding his condition and age as he is just 11 years old and my fears about surgery at that early age .I'm very much satisfied  with the ********* *** explanation and their experience in dealing complex maxillofacial surgeries . Dr Haranadha Reddy and Dr Lavanya did excellent treatment for my son which went very well. Now my son is doing very well and we are very happy with the treatment and highly recommend to everyone. Any face related problems or jaw issues, dental treatments one stop solution is adithri dental and maxillofacial surgery center adithri dental clinic is very good  with good team of doctors and medical and paramedical staff  my followup appointments were regularly monitored I'm completely impressed with overall care and concern .thankyou dr.haranadh reddy and Dr.lavanya

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have visited Dr. Harinadha Reddy in Dec 2019 with a cyst issue in lower right jaw for my Son.  Dr.Harinadha Reddy has explained clearly regarding the procedure and we were confident enough to go through the biopsy procedure by Dr. Swetcha on the same day due to the support and thorough explanation by Dr. Harinadha.  We had to wait for the biopsy reports for 15 days which Dr. Harinadha has already alerted us upfront.  Dr. Harinadha Reddy and Dr. Swetcha from same clinic even followed up with Pathology clinic to fasttrack the process and to provide 2 reports in 2 phases.  

After getting the biopsy report results, the team of both Dr. Harinadha and Dr. Swetcha clearly explained us regarding Oral Surgery procedure and assured us along with showing us the case studies from previous procedures and assured us that they will take care of removal of ameloblastic fibro odontoma in lower right mandibular region for my Son.  The entire procedure went through smoothly and the team has provided good support through out the Oral Surgery and recovery process.  The team has even trained me in doing a gauge pack in the lower jaw.

We have recently visited a oral surgeon in US and have done X-Ray of the surgery spot and the surgical spot has healed well with bone filling the jaw region.  The Oral Surgeon has passed on the complements to Dr. Harinadha reddy and team and told us that the surgeon has done a very good job in removing the Cyst.

I can't say enough about this team of individuals. They are just exceptional in every facet of their work. From their compassion, professional expertise and customer orientation, they are among the finest we have ever seen. We would'nt have come through my "ordeal" as well as I did without them. There aren't enough stars to give them!!! Thank you is all I can say and you can have complete faith and confidence in the entire team.
reply_text: Thank you very much Ma'am for the valuable feedback back... Its our core responsibility to deliver the best possible treatment.. Thank a lot again.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr .Haranadh  explained the issue regarding wisdom tooth as in where it is positioned and how it is positioned .My wisdom tooth was directly placed above nerve ending hence complete extraction was not the solution as it can damage the nerve. Dr. Haranadh used his immense knowledge and experience and as per latest technology he extracted the tooth partially above jaw line and sitched the jaw line so that remaining tooth and nerve ending is not damaged .i would recommend this doctor .

Dr.luvanaya madam is very friendly and helps calms a patient .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My name is mallesham, I'm diagnosed with oral cancer of left side of jaw .I visited lots of surgeons and I not satisfied with the explanation and diagnosis of my problem.
Later with my friend suggestion I visited adithri maxillofacial  center there my problem was diagnosed exactly and explanation of my condition and explaining treatment plan was very nice and prompt .I'm completely satisfied with Dr.Haranadha Reddy sir and Dr.Lavanya mam treatment plan. I underwent surgery for my oral cancer with Resection and reconstruction with free fibula flap which is very advanced technique .with successful results .my surgery went well and flap was successful .post operative case and followup was very nice.im completely satisfied with the overall treatment.
I would like to reffer and suggest Adithri maxillofacial center for any maxillofacial related problems . Genuine treatment and guidance with overall care and comfort .thank you Dr.Haranadh sir and Dr.Lavanya mam for saving my life from oral cancer and giving me a good quality of life .
Godbless you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am facing dental jaw pain issue while taking food.As per my friend suggestion I travelled from Mumbai to Hyderabad for Haranadhreddy sir consulatation.He explained whole problem clearly and explained solution in detail as full dental implantation surgery.

After few days started the surgery.Surgery started by doctor Lavanya madam and Haranadhreddy Sir.Both successfully completed the first lower part surgery  without any pain.the surgery will take 7 hours and appreciate the both doctors for their hardwork and dedication for final proper output.
Haranadh Reddy sir will not compromise till getting the proper results after surgery even it's getting late in the night.in between they continuously check and ask if we are facing any issue or pain.

After few days they done the surgery for upper part also successfully and its took almost 7 hours again and temparory teeth fixed now by doctor Karan sir.He is also very talktive and done good job for teeth fixing.

The whole doctors team here appeciatable and very coordinative and very helpful and very punctual for appointment schedules.Even for payments also they will not force and pressurise us.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: There was heavy teeth pain and decay to me.unable eat food  and crush even most soft food.i was referred to Dr.Harnath reddy by one of my students who was in medical field that too in dental field.he suggested me to go for dental implants  which would give me permanent solution to my problem.intially I was little hesitant keeping in view the procedure that I have to undergo.He gave confidence and I too believed in his capabilities. Dr.Harnathreddy took lot of care in treating  me  .I went for total implants. Now I am at the age 72 could able eat mouthful because of this young and talented Docter. Apart from this i want to put forth my experiences as a patient with adithri.this clinic has routine equipment as well as specialized to meet all the needs of patients. The team of Doctors under the leadership of Dr.Harnath are excellent.Dr.swechcha  who does service in the absence of Dr.Harnath is very good.precautions they undertake in covid situations is exemplary.. I thank Dr.Harnath and his team for their services and I strongly recommend  this clinic to prefer for their dental problem

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a problem with my jaws. It was complicated and after visiting Dr.Harinadh Reddy sir, he suggested surgery for both the jaws. Firstly I had many doubts and fears about the surgery like what happens if it gets more complicated after surgery etc. But doc harinath sir clearly explained about complications and solutions for it and assured me with the best results. Then I had decided to go with the surgery, it was 9 hour long surgery but a successful one.

As told before by the doc, there was swelling in the face and it healed very quickly than normal because of using the medication doc suggested. In 2 months my condition got normal and i started eating everything. To be frank I was really amazed by the results. Dr.Harinath Reddy sir and his team are very experienced and very friendly.  They made sure I feel comfortable throughout the treatment and post surgery time They followed me up until I recovered completely.
The best clinic for all the dental problems with latest equipments and  latest technologies. Highly experienced doctors and staff. They take very good precautions even in the time of corona pandemic. Clinic is very hygiene and all preventive measures are taken by the staff.
reply_text: Thank You so much Mr.Tarun for the appreciation for the proceedings and result of cosmetic face surgery you got done by us... Thank You.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had an elongated lower jaw and severe under bite i.e. when I bite my lower jaw was 1 cm forward than my upper jaw due to which I had difficulty in chewing food as only 1 pair of teeth on each side would come one on one and the rest of teeth had no opposition. Even my pronunciation while talking was not clear some times.

I visited Dr. Haranadha reddy for my condition and he diagnosed me with server underbite (class 3 mal-occlusion) due to under development of upper jaw and over devolopment of lower jaw. He suggested for double jaw surgery(orthognathic surgery) which was the only treatment. After assessing my x-rays and teeth models they have planned for the surgery within a month the plan was to push my lower jaw backward and pull my upper jaw forward by which my bite will become normal.

Today I am 3 weeks post operation. I am very happy with the surgery and I have no complications. After the day of surgery I had swelling on my face which is experienced by every patient of jaw surgery, by the end of 1st week 60% of my swelling has disappeared though I felt weak initially after surgery by the end of 1st week I regained my energy levels and was able to do my daily activist on my own.
By the end of 2nd week 80% of my swelling disappeared and I even resumed my works by going to college regularly. By the end of 3rd week almost all of the visible swelling has gone and my speech had become clear.

If you are also having similar condition then I highly recommend you to get the surgery done as it is very much common now a day's and also the surgery is safe and affordable. There is no need to worry about complications as long as you are in the hands of an experienced suergon like Dr.Haranadha reddy. He and his team have done a great job and I am really happy with the outcome of the surgery and my above mentioned problems have solved and additionally I got a great improvement in my smile.

review: I'm gopal , met with a road traffic accident   and broken my lower jaw suffered with pain and unable to eat food .At Adithri maxillo facial center my problem was addressed immediately and diagnosed as facial fracture ( left mandible ramus and condyle  fracture).I underwent surgery by Dr. Haranadh Reddy  sir and Dr.Lavanya mam .surgery went well and treatment  was excellent.im completely satisfied and  the staff are very supportive. I'm very much thankful to Dr.Haranadh  Reddy sir  and Dr.lavanya mam .

Doctor has been very supportive and cleared all my doubts and concerns regarding surgery. Post surgery has been good and doctor helped me recover within the time period. I'm very happy with the results and I recommend the doctor for people looking for correction in jaw and dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hello to all those reading this review . I would highly recommend Adithri Dental clinic to everyone who is in need of dental care . My mother was suffering from severe tooth ache since 2 weeks when I took her to Adithri Dental clinic . Prompt diagnosis by well trained doctors and immediate treatment by well experienced root canal specialist gave her quick relief . The clinic is equipped with high grade dental chairs , radiograph machine and several other dental instruments . The appointment schedule was easy to follow with accurate SMS reminders through practo app which is a very convenient feature. High quality service and treatment was provided at adequate costs . All treatment options are priced moderately . All in all Adithri Dental clinic is one stop for all your dental care at affordable prices .

Overall happy with the result and an exceptional experience of Dr. Haranadha Reddy and his team. I'm so much happy and thank ful for the phenomenal results. context: Dental Implant Fixing,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Excellent team of doctors. 
Dr. Harinath Reddy has checked, diagnosed all the dental issues my mother is suffering with, and explained to us clearly. Entire treatment is well planned considering our convenience and all the appointment dates were communicated to us well in advance. 
Dr. Sravan has done her root canal treatment with utmost care. 
Dr. Karan, Dr. Lavanya and Dr. Tanveer have performed procedures - bridge fixing, dental surgery, teeth cleaning, laser treatment very carefully.
All the doctors are very patient and friendly and we would 100% recommend this place for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I'm Dr.Pallavi, a dentist .I recently got my both wisdom tooth extracted by Dr.Haranadh Reddy sir.It was a much better experience I must say.Both the teeth were deep under the bone, sir removed both of them in lesser time  than I was expecting .He is a person who is cool and you can really be confident and calm .Dr Haranadh Reddy and his team of doctors ,one of them who is Dr Teja and the assistants made my surgical impaction get done well overall.

Well equipped hospital coupled with cheerful attitude and skill of the doctors makes 'Adithri dental and maxilofacial surgery centre' the right place for getting your treatment done.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Reddy and his team were wonderful to work with. They explained everything thoroughly and tracked my progress. My first surgery went well, but there was one part that required a 2nd procedure. He and his team took the time to make sure it was done right, which I very much appreciate. 

I came to India from the US for my surgery. I was very well taken care of and felt safe the entire time. His team helped locate a helper that stayed with me for 3 weeks. It could not have been a more wonderful experience. One suggestion (unrelated to Dr. Reddy's office) is to make sure the hospital can process your credit card or money transfer. That was a bit stressful so check when you arrive that everything will go through.

Overall, I am very pleased with the surgery I received and the bedside manner pre and post-op.  Dr. Reddy visited and checked on me often, even after I returned to the States. I would highly recommend his practice.
reply_text: Thank you so much Ms Paige for getting the face surgery got done by me coming all the way from United States of America...  It was a wonderful experience for us too to treat you... Thank you once again.

review:
I had receeding chin before and I was under confident about my smile, when I searched for facial corrections online, I came across Dr.Haranadha reddy's work on facial correction and I was fairly shocked by the results and I went to his clinic for a consult and that was it, I didn't need another opinion or consult the way he explained the procedures using pictures and old case references gave me thorough idea about facial corrections.  he gave me a proper picture of what's gonna happen with pictures and mock surgery models, it was a long surgery but when I look at myself in the mirror it's one of the best decisions I've ever made
My smile is different now 
Very confident 
Thank you so much sir

Im very thankful to the doctor and his whole team for this.

Before visiting adithri clinic, i went to another dentist he said that extraction takes around one hour, but dr haranath sirs techniques of extraction is different and its minimally invasive procedure. review:
I had a problem with my teeth...like they were not in a proper way and because of which I was not able to smile properly. So, on one fine day I visited adithri dental and they suggested to go with braces for 2 years and after that I was being suggested for lower jaw surgery. At first I was so nervous to undergo a surgery and then I have expressed my fears and doubts to Dr.Harinath Reddy Sir , Swetcha ma'am and Lavanya ma'am . They have cleared every doubt and made me confident to go with surgery and recently I have undergone with the surgery (i.e, on 2/07/2020).
It was a very good experience. Now I can see a lot of difference and I'm so happy with it.
The infrastructural facilities in the clinic are really good.
Everyone at the clinic are well experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: So basically i was suffering with the pain of impacted wisdom teeth. So these impaction of your 3rd molars, the wisdom tooth is very common and it often cause mild to moderate pain. So i decided to my dentist. My dentist was very calm explaining me about it and also giving me the injections which is the scariest part. She has given me the LA so slowly and painless that i actually havent felt a minute pain too, and then just a min, my tooth was out.  After removal of tooth, you would have a swelling or pain for 3days for which medications will be prescribed. I recommend you to visit sirs clinic, its neat well maintained and also the dentist is very well experienced and patient enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,

He has this "DENTAL VIBE" that you will not feel the pain with the needle when giving numbing agent and believe me when I say... I was so relaxed and even fall sleep during the procedure. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Harandh sir is very friendly and skilled doctor. He explains everything patiently and gives the best advice.  I had gummy smile and he did my laser gingivectomy and now I have a beautiful smile. He also extracted my Wisdom tooth.. Inspite of its close proximity to the nerve.. He removed it so swiftly and easily without any discomfort. The clinic has the best team of doctors with the latest equipment and technology.

review:
I didn't see harinath at all
 There were other junior doctors instead of haranadh. Would have been better if He was available at the appointment.
reply_text: Hi...This is Dr.Haranadh Reddy,Professor & Maxillofacial Surgeon. As I involve treating patients in emergency accident cases, which sometimes take unusually more time might have lead to my delay in attending elective dental cases.. that too its very rare to happen like this.. As priority is to be given to emergencies, my presence in clinic was delayed on that day.Our junior doctors will definitely might have told you to wait for sometime to see me.Anyway Sorry for the inconvenience.
